Uses of Interface
imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.common.Point

  • Packages that use Point 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.common
    This package defines common interfaces and utility methods used by the different Delaunay implementations.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.impChew
    Implementation of the incremental triangulation algorithm proposed by Paul Chew.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.impGuibas
    Implementation of the randomized incremental algorithm described in Guibas, Knuth, Sharir, "Randomized incremental construction of Delaunay and Voronoi diagrams", Algorithmica, no.
